caption:
🔬With chronic diseases and life expectancy on the rise, the demand for medical imaging is at an all-time high, putting radiologists under tremendous pressure. One of the solutions? #AI. 

At Bayer, we perceive AI not just as tech; it's about modernizing global healthcare to better serve people. Teaming up with @googlecloud, we're aiming to fast-track the development of efficient AI-powered healthcare apps while maintaining top-tier data security standards. 

This partnership is to help organizations overcome the challenges of building reliable AI-powered medical imaging software, including the need for appropriate and cost-effective data-sharing mechanisms. ✨

#TeamBayer #Radiology #MedicalImaging
